nodes.excerpt: A platform to streamline clinical operations for behavioral health clinics -- including scheduling, patient management, session notes, and more -- so clinics can get back to what really matters: treating their patients. Launching in the autism space.

nodes.excerpt: Your digital assets which are exposed to the internet create threats. SwordEye Attack surface mapping constantly monitors your exposed digital assets, external threats and determines your risk score with zero-setup.
nodes.title: Know Your Attack Surface - Your digital assets exposed to the internet create threats.
nodes.author: Seyfullah KILIÇ

localize.description: 您暴露在互联网上的数字资产会产生威胁。SwordEye攻击面图谱持续监控您暴露的数字资产、外部威胁，并以零设置确定您的风险分数。
localize.tagline: 您暴露在互联网上的数字资产会产生威胁。

localize.description: 您暴露在互聯網上的數字資產會產生威脅。SwordEye攻擊面圖譜持續監控您暴露的數字資產、外部威脅，並以零設置確定您的風險分數。
localize.tagline: 您暴露在互聯網上的數字資產會產生威脅。

nodes.excerpt: qr.eletto.dev is a simple QR code generator for developers. It can be used in any project to quickly generate QR codes. Instead of installing libraries into your project to generate QR codes, you can just use the URL as an image.
nodes.title: QR Code Generator For Developers - A quick API to generate QR codes in your apps
nodes.author: JohnAnthony Eletto

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一个简单的二维码生成器，适用于开发者。它可以用于任何项目中快速生成二维码。不需要在你的项目中安装库来生成二维码，你只需要使用URL作为图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的应用程序中生成QR码的快速API。

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一個簡單的二維碼生成器，適用於開發者。它可以用於任何項目中快速生成二維碼。不需要在你的項目中安裝庫來生成二維碼，你只需要使用URL作爲圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的應用程序中生成QR碼的快速API。

nodes.excerpt: ShareDocView.com lets you share documents (PDF, Word, PowerPoint) with links to get detailed analytics on who opened which doc, when and for how long. Plus you can get email leads! ⠀ Get a FREE account and ask us in the live chat about the Product Hunt deal!
nodes.title: ShareDocView - Share docs with links to get analytics and email leads
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: ShareDocView.com让您可以分享带有链接的文档（PDF、Word、PowerPoint），以获得关于谁打开了哪个文档、何时打开以及多长时间的详细分析。此外，您还可以获得电子邮件线索 ⠀ 获得一个免费的账户，并在即时聊天中询问我们关于产品狩猎的交易!
localize.tagline: 分享带有链接的文档，以获得分析和电子邮件线索。

localize.description: ShareDocView.com讓您可以分享帶有鏈接的文檔（PDF、Word、PowerPoint），以獲得關於誰打開了哪個文檔、何時打開以及多長時間的詳細分析。此外，您還可以獲得電子郵件線索 ⠀ 獲得一個免費的賬戶，並在即時聊天中詢問我們關於產品狩獵的交易!
localize.tagline: 分享帶有鏈接的文檔，以獲得分析和電子郵件線索。

nodes.excerpt: Think of Enlightn as your performance and security consultant. 120 automated checks that “review” your code, server configurations and more to provide actionable recommendations on improving your Laravel app’s performance and security.

nodes.excerpt: Divjoy makes it ridiculously easy to start your next React project. Pick all the things you need in your codebase (UI kit, auth, database, payments, etc), choose a beautiful template, then export a complete React codebase. Everything just works 😻

nodes.excerpt: 🤔 Do you think you have seen everything in dating apps? Hardly! ❤️ Zodier is a new way to look for mates and it‘s already in your phone! We unite bots and dating to simplify meeting and chatting. 😻 Dating + chatbots = Zodier. This is how the Zodier starts!

localize.description: 🤔你认为你已经看到了约会应用程序的一切？几乎没有! ❤️Zodier是一种全新的寻找伴侣的方式，它已经在你的手机里了! 我们将机器人和约会结合起来，简化了见面和聊天的过程。😻约会+聊天机器人=Zodier。这就是Zodier的开始!
localize.tagline: 在流行的信使的聊天机器人中约会。

localize.description: 🤔你認爲你已經看到了約會應用程序的一切？幾乎沒有! ❤️Zodier是一種全新的尋找伴侶的方式，它已經在你的手機裏了! 我們將機器人和約會結合起來，簡化了見面和聊天的過程。😻約會+聊天機器人=Zodier。這就是Zodier的開始!

localize.tagline: 一边看网剧，一边健身。

localize.description: 通過這個免費的Chrome擴展，您可以觀看任何Netflix節目，同時我們通過屏幕角落裏的簡單體重練習來指導您。
localize.tagline: 一邊看網劇，一邊健身。

nodes.excerpt: Afino is a web-based app that makes it easy for managers and leaders to keep their team connected, engaged, and productive. With Afino, you can quickly and easily set up fun team events, track important metrics, and find ways to boost team health.
nodes.title: Afino - Build a great culture for your team, from anywhere.
nodes.author: James Quinn

localize.description: Afino是一款基于网络的应用程序，它可以让管理者和领导者轻松地保持团队的联系、参与和生产力。有了Afino，你可以快速、轻松地设置有趣的团队活动，跟踪重要的指标，并找到促进团队健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 从任何地方为您的团队建立一个良好的文化。

localize.description: Afino是一款基於網絡的應用程序，它可以讓管理者和領導者輕鬆地保持團隊的聯繫、參與和生產力。有了Afino，你可以快速、輕鬆地設置有趣的團隊活動，跟蹤重要的指標，並找到促進團隊健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 從任何地方爲您的團隊建立一個良好的文化。
